text: Hello everyone, nice to meet you. Let me introduce myself. My name is Julie Anderson. I'm 9 years old. I'm from South Africa. I like pancakes and hot dogs. I like yellow. I like cats. Now you know more about me. I hope we can be friends!

I'm 9 years old. I'm from South Africa. I like pancakes and hot dogs. I like yellow. I like cats.
